events.event: BlackRock founded by Larry Fink, Robert Kapito, Susan Wagner, Barbara Novick (Blackstone subsidiary)
BlackRock spins off from Blackstone as independent company
Acquires Merrill Lynch Investment Managers - major growth
Financial crisis - BlackRock hired by Fed to value toxic assets (conflict of interest)
Acquires Barclays Global Investors (including iShares ETF business) - becomes largest asset manager
Larry Fink's annual letter emphasizes ESG and stakeholder capitalism (signals policy shift)
BlackRock hired by Federal Reserve for COVID bond purchase programs
Brian Deese (BlackRock exec) appointed Biden National Economic Council Director
ESG voting campaigns against fossil fuel companies, board composition mandates
Political backlash - Republican state treasurers divest from BlackRock over ESG policies
